[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] paccayacatukkaṃ.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmahetukaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko, phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ ^a^T0.0199^ea^. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 257^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0155^ea^ ^a^P0.0149^ea^ katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0168^ea^ katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmahetukaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmahetukaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā''.
[03] tattha katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā ^a^T0.0200^ea^ upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ? yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ...pe0... titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho -- idaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti''ti.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ ^a^P0.0150^ea^ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ, nāmapaccayā phasso nāmahetuko, phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] nāmapaccayā phasso nāmahetukoti. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? ṭhapetvā phassaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''.

[03] tattha ^a^T0.0202^ea^ katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukanti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukaṃ? cakkhāyatanaṃ ^a^P0.0153^ea^, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ ^a^V0.0172^ea^, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0159^ea^ katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā''.
[03] tattha katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ? yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ...pe0... titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho -- idaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] hetucatukkaṃ.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto, phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ; upādānapaccayā ^a^V0.0173^ea^ bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 265^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0160^ea^ katamo avijjāpaccayā ^a^T0.0205^ea^ saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ ^a^P0.0154^ea^ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā''.
[03] tattha katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0174^ea^ katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ? yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ...pe0... titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho -- idaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ'' ^a^T0.0206^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ, nāmapaccayā phasso nāmasampayutto, phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā ^a^M0.0161^ea^, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 267^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto? yā ^a^P0.0155^ea^ cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ''.
[03] nāmapaccayā phasso nāmasampayuttoti. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? ṭhapetvā phassaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho ^a^T0.0207^ea^ viññāṇakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamo nāmapaccayā phasso nāmasampayutto? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā phasso nāmasampayutto''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^V0.0175^ea^ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto, phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā ^a^M0.0162^ea^ jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 269^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0156^ea^ katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ ^a^T0.0208^ea^ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttanti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0176^ea^ katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^M0.0163^ea^ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ ^a^T0.0209^ea^ chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto, phassapaccayā ^a^P0.0157^ea^ vedanā phassasampayuttā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāsampayuttā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāsampayuttaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 271^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāsampayutto''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi ^a^V0.0177^ea^ rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ chaṭṭhāyatananti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha ^a^T0.0210^ea^ katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cattāro ca mahābhūtā, yañca rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ ^a^M0.0164^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0158^ea^ katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] sampayuttacatukkaṃ.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā; saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro; viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ; nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmaṃ; chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ; phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayāpi phasso; vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā; taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā; upādānapaccayā ^a^V0.0178^ea^ bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 273^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0211^ea^ katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ.
[03] tattha katamo viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0165^ea^ katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0159^ea^ katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0179^ea^ katamaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho ^a^T0.0212^ea^, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayāpi phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayāpi phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''.
[03] tattha katamā taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ? yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ...pe0... titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho -- idaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamā upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā? yo rāgo...pe0... cittassa ^a^T0.0213^ea^ sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0166^ea^ katamo upādānapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā upādānaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upādānapaccayā bhavo''.
[03] tattha katamā bhavapaccayā jāti? yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jāti sañjāti nibbatti abhinibbati pātubhāvo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``bhavapaccayā jāti''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ? atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ. tattha katamā jarā? yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jarā jīraṇatā āyuno saṃhāni -- ayaṃ vuccati ^a^P0.0160^ea^ ``jarā''. tattha katamaṃ maraṇaṃ? yo tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``maraṇaṃ''. iti ayañca jarā, idañca maraṇaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ''.

[03] evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa saṅgati hoti, samāgamo hoti, samodhānaṃ hoti, pātubhāvo hoti. tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā; saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro; viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ; nāmapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayāpi nāmaṃ; phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayāpi phasso; vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā; taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ ^a^T0.0214^ea^, upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 275^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0181^ea^ katamā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0167^ea^ katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] nāmapaccayā ^a^P0.0161^ea^ phassoti. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? ṭhapetvā phassaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo nāmapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā phasso'' ^a^T0.0215^ea^.

[03] tattha katamaṃ phassapaccayāpi nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayāpi nāmaṃ''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā; saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro; viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ; nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ; chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā ^a^V0.0182^ea^ phasso, phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ; phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayāpi phasso; vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā; taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 277^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0168^ea^ katamā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ ^a^T0.0216^ea^ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo ^a^P0.0162^ea^, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇanti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho ^a^V0.0183^ea^, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatananti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ ^a^T0.0217^ea^ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ^a^M0.0169^ea^ ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^P0.0163^ea^ ^a^V0.0184^ea^ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā; saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro; viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ; nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ; chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ; phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayāpi phasso; vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayāpi vedanā; taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayāpi taṇhā; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa ^a^T0.0218^ea^ samudayo hoti.
[03] 279^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0170^ea^ katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati nāmaṃ. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V0.0185^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇanti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ ^a^T0.0219^ea^ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0164^ea^ katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ''.

[03] nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti. atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cattāro ca mahābhūtā, yañca rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ? cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ? atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmaṃ''. tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``rūpaṃ''. iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0171^ea^ ^a^V0.0186^ea^ katamaṃ phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] aññamaññacatukkaṃ.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0220^ea^ dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ ^a^P0.0165^ea^ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 281^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''.
[03] tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro...pe0....
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0187^ea^ katamo taṇhāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``taṇhāpaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā ^a^M0.0172^ea^ bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0221^ea^ dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 283^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0166^ea^ katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati avijjā...pe0....

[01] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ ^a^T0.0222^ea^, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā ^a^V0.0188^ea^, taṇhāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 285^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0173^ea^ dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā paṭighaṃ, paṭighapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 287^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ ^a^P0.0167^ea^ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ vedanāpaccayā paṭighaṃ? yo cittassa āghāto...pe0... caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo {asulopo (syā0)} anattamanatā cittassa -- idaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā paṭighaṃ'' ^a^T0.0223^ea^.
[03] tattha katamo paṭighapaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``paṭighapaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0189^ea^ katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha ^a^M0.0174^ea^, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā vicikicchā, vicikicchāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 289^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0168^ea^ katamā vedanāpaccayā vicikicchā? yā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā ^a^T0.0224^ea^ dveḷhakaṃ dvidhāpatho {dvedhāpatho (sī0 syā0)} saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhaṇā {apariyogāhanā (sī0 syā0 ka0)} chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā vicikicchā''.

[03] tattha katamo vicikicchāpaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā vicikicchaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vicikicchāpaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^V0.0190^ea^ dhammā akusalā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā uddhaccaṃ, uddhaccapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 291^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0175^ea^ katamā avijjā? yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjā''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ vedanāpaccayā uddhaccaṃ? yaṃ cittassa uddhaccaṃ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṃ cittassa ^a^T0.0225^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā uddhaccaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo uddhaccapaccayā adhimokkho? yo ^a^P0.0169^ea^ cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``uddhaccapaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] akusalaniddeso.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^V0.0191^ea^ dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 293^b^.^eb^ tattha katame kusalamūlā? alobho, adoso, amoho.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0176^ea^ katamo alobho? yo alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṃ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṃ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``alobho''.
[03] tattha katamo adoso? yo adoso adussanā adussitattaṃ abyāpādo ^a^T0.0226^ea^ abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adoso''.
[03] tattha katamo amoho? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``amoho''. ime vuccanti ``kusalamūlā''.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0170^ea^ katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ...pe0... viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ...pe0... nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ...pe0... chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso...pe0... phassapaccayā vedanā...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0192^ea^ katamo vedanāpaccayā pasādo? yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā pasādo''.
[03] tattha katamo pasādapaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pasādapaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā ^a^T0.0227^ea^ viññāṇaṃ ^a^M0.0177^ea^, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] tattha katamo adoso? yo adoso adussanā adussitattaṃ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adoso''. ime vuccanti ``kusalamūlā''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0193^ea^ katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho ^a^P0.0174^ea^, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0182^ea^ katamo vedanāpaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā vedanaṃ, saññākkhandho ^a^T0.0233^ea^ saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ^a^V0.0198^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmahetukaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko, phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārasampayuttaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmasampayuttaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanasampayutto, phassapaccayā vedanā phassasampayuttā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi saṅkhāro; viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayāpi ^a^P0.0175^ea^ viññāṇaṃ; nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmaṃ; chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayāpi chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ; phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayāpi phasso; vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā ^a^T0.0234^ea^ jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ...pe0... ghānaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ...pe0... jivhāviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rasārammaṇaṃ...pe0... kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti sukhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 312^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0183^ea^ ^a^V0.0199^ea^ katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ kāyikaṃ sātaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.

[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā vedanaṃ, saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0235^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā saddārammaṇā vā gandhārammaṇā vā rasārammaṇā vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā ^a^P0.0176^ea^ viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 314^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanodhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ ^a^V0.0200^ea^ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0184^ea^ katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0236^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā saddārammaṇā vā gandhārammaṇā vā rasārammaṇā vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 316^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0201^ea^ katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0237^ea^ ^a^M0.0185^ea^ ^a^P0.0177^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā saddārammaṇā vā gandhārammaṇā vā rasārammaṇā vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 318^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0202^ea^ katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0238^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ^a^M0.0186^ea^ ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 320^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā pasādo? yā ^a^P0.0178^ea^ saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā pasādo''.
[03] tattha katamo pasādapaccayā adhimokkho ^a^T0.0239^ea^? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pasādapaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0203^ea^ katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ ^a^M0.0187^ea^, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo ^a^P0.0179^ea^, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja ^a^T0.0240^ea^ viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^V0.0204^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo ^a^T0.0241^ea^, bhavapaccayā ^a^P0.0180^ea^ jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudayo hoti.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0188^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ...pe0... sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ...pe0... ghānaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ...pe0... jivhāviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rasārammaṇaṃ...pe0... kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 325^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ ^a^P0.0181^ea^ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā saddārammaṇā vā gandhārammaṇā vā rasārammaṇā vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0206^ea^ katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ ^a^T0.0243^ea^, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 329^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhāro''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0190^ea^ ^a^P0.0182^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye manodhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā...pe0... manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā ^a^T0.0244^ea^ neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā...pe0... manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^V0.0207^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā ^a^T0.0245^ea^ chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā ^a^P0.0183^ea^ jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā ^a^M0.0191^ea^ jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye arūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ ^a^P0.0184^ea^, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā ^a^T0.0246^ea^ jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[06] abyākataniddeso.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^V0.0208^ea^ dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 335^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro''...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0192^ea^ katamo vedanāpaccayā pasādo? yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā pasādo''.
[03] tattha katamo pasādapaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pasādapaccayā adhimokkho''.

[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho ^a^T0.0247^ea^ saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā ^a^V0.0209^ea^ nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^P0.0185^ea^ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0248^ea^ dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ...pe0... somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ ^a^M0.0193^ea^ sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ...pe0... upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi ^a^P0.0186^ea^ ...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā ^a^V0.0210^ea^ saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0249^ea^ dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā ^a^P0.0187^ea^, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho ^a^M0.0194^ea^, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudayo hoti.
[06] avijjāmūlakakusalaniddeso.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa ^a^T0.0250^ea^ kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye ^a^V0.0211^ea^ kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ...pe0... ghānaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ...pe0... jivhāviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rasārammaṇaṃ...pe0... kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti sukhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ...pe0... manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā...pe0... manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā...pe0... manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā ^a^T0.0251^ea^ rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro ^a^M0.0195^ea^, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā ^a^P0.0188^ea^, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā...pe0... upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā ^a^V0.0212^ea^ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0252^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ ^a^P0.0189^ea^. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0196^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ ^a^T0.0253^ea^, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo ^a^V0.0213^ea^, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammā kusalā.

[03] tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudayo hoti.
[06] kusalamūlakavipākaniddeso.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0197^ea^ ^a^P0.0190^ea^ dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā ^a^T0.0254^ea^ viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ ^a^V0.0214^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ...pe0... ghānaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ...pe0... jivhāviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rasārammaṇaṃ...pe0... kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ...pe0... manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo ^a^T0.0255^ea^ hoti.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ katame dhammā abyākatā? yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā...pe0... dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso ^a^M0.0198^ea^, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti ^a^P0.0191^ea^, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] 354^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0215^ea^ katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho -- idaṃ vuccati ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^T0.0256^ea^ katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''.
[03] tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``phassapaccayā vedanā''.
[03] tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho''.
[03] tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo''.
[03] tattha katamā bhavapaccayā jāti? yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jāti sañjāti nibbatti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``bhavapaccayā jāti''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ? atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ. tattha katamā jarā? yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jarā jīraṇatā āyuno saṃhāni ^a^M0.0199^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati jarā. tattha katamaṃ maraṇaṃ? yo tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhānaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``maraṇaṃ''. iti ayañca jarā, idañca maraṇaṃ. idaṃ vuccati ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ''.

[03] evametassa ^a^V0.0216^ea^ kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa saṅgati hoti, samāgamo hoti, samodhānaṃ ^a^T0.0257^ea^ hoti, pātubhāvo hoti. tena ^a^P0.0192^ea^ vuccati evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti.
[06] akusalamūlakavipākaniddeso.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.
[06] paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo {paccayākāravibhaṅgo (sī0 syā0)} niṭṭhito.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^a^P0.0193^ea^ ^a^V0.0217^ea^ satipaṭṭhānā -- idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati bahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, ajjhattaṃ citte cittānupassī viharati bahiddhā citte cittānupassī viharati ajjhattabahiddhā citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, ajjhattaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati bahiddhā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^T0.0258^ea^ bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati -- ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru {nahāru (sī0)} aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ {aṭṭhimiñjā (sī0)} vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta''nti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so ^a^V0.0218^ea^ taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā bahiddhā kāye cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca ^a^P0.0194^ea^ bhikkhu bahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu bahiddhā kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati -- ``atthissa kāye kesā lomā ^a^M0.0201^ea^ nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta''nti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ajjhattabahiddhā kāye cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca ^a^T0.0259^ea^ bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati -- ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta''nti. evaṃ bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ anupassīti. tattha katamā anupassanā? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``anupassanā''. imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``anupassī''ti.
[03] 358^b^.^eb^ viharatīti. iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ātāpīti. tattha katamo ātāpo {katamaṃ ātāpaṃ (sabbattha)}? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo ^a^V0.0219^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``ātāpo''. iminā ātāpena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``ātāpī''ti.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ sampajānoti ^a^T0.0260^ea^ ^a^M0.0202^ea^. tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati ``sampajaññaṃ''. iminā sampajaññena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno ^a^P0.0195^ea^ sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``sampajāno''ti.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ satimāti. tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''. imāya satiyā upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``satimā''ti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti. tattha katamo loko? sveva kāyo loko. pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko. ayaṃ vuccati ``loko''. tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''. tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``domanassaṃ''. iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa''nti.
[06] kāyānupassanāniddeso.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^T0.0261^ea^ bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ^a^V0.0220^ea^ vedayamāno ``sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``sāmisaṃ dukkhaṃ ^a^M0.0203^ea^ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``nirāmisaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``sāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ``nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī''ti ^a^P0.0196^ea^ pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā bahiddhā vedanāsu cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ ^a^T0.0262^ea^ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``sāmisaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``nirāmisaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``sāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ ``nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayatī''ti pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ``sukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ``dukkhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ``adukkhamasukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ``sāmisā ^a^V0.0221^ea^ sukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ``nirāmisā sukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ``sāmisā dukkhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ``nirāmisā dukkhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, sāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ``sāmisā adukkhamasukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti, nirāmisaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ^a^M0.0204^ea^ ``nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā vedanā''ti pajānāti. evaṃ bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ anupassīti ^a^T0.0263^ea^ ...pe0... viharatīti...pe0... ātāpīti...pe0... sampajānoti...pe0... ^a^P0.0197^ea^ satimāti...pe0... vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti. tattha katamo loko? sāyeva vedanā loko. pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko. ayaṃ vuccati ``loko''. tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''. tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``domanassaṃ''. iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa''nti.
[06] vedanānupassanāniddeso.
