[03] 365^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ citte cittānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ``sarāgaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vītarāgaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, sadosaṃ vā cittaṃ ``sadosaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, vītadosaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vītadosaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, samohaṃ vā cittaṃ ``samohaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, vītamohaṃ ^a^V0.0222^ea^ vā cittaṃ ``vītamohaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ ``saṃkhittaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, vikkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vikkhittaṃ me citta''nti ^a^T0.0264^ea^ pajānāti, mahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ ``mahaggataṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, amahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ ``amahaggataṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, sauttaraṃ vā cittaṃ ``sauttaraṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ ``anuttaraṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ ``samāhitaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, asamāhitaṃ ^a^M0.0205^ea^ vā cittaṃ ``asamāhitaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vimuttaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti, avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ ``avimuttaṃ me citta''nti pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā bahiddhā citte cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu bahiddhā citte cittānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``sarāgamassa citta''nti pajānāti, vītarāgaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``vītarāgamassa citta''nti pajānāti, sadosaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``sadosamassa citta''nti ^a^P0.0198^ea^ pajānāti, vītadosaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``vītadosamassa citta''nti pajānāti, samohaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``samohamassa citta''nti pajānāti, vītamohaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``vītamohamassa citta''nti pajānāti, saṃkhittaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``saṃkhittamassa citta''nti pajānāti, vikkhittaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``vikkhittamassa citta''nti pajānāti, mahaggataṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``mahaggatamassa citta''nti pajānāti, amahaggataṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``amahaggatamassa citta''nti pajānāti, sauttaraṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``sauttaramassa citta''nti pajānāti, anuttaraṃ vāssa ^a^T0.0265^ea^ cittaṃ ``anuttaramassa citta''nti pajānāti, samāhitaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``samāhitamassa citta''nti pajānāti, asamāhitaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``asamāhitamassa citta''nti pajānāti, vimuttaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``vimuttamassa citta''nti pajānāti, avimuttaṃ vāssa cittaṃ ``avimuttamassa citta''nti pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ajjhattabahiddhā citte cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā citte cittānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ``sarāgaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vītarāgaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, sadosaṃ ^a^V0.0223^ea^ vā cittaṃ ``sadosaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, vītadosaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vītadosaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, samohaṃ vā cittaṃ ``samohaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, vītamohaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vītamohaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ ``saṃkhittaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, vikkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vikkhittaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, mahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ ``mahaggataṃ citta''nti pajānāti, amahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ ``amahaggataṃ citta''nti pajānāti, sauttaraṃ vā cittaṃ ``sauttaraṃ citta''nti pajānāti, anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ ``anuttaraṃ citta''nti pajānāti ^a^M0.0206^ea^, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ ``samāhitaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ ``asamāhitaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ ``vimuttaṃ citta''nti pajānāti, avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ ``avimuttaṃ citta''nti pajānāti. evaṃ bhikkhu ^a^T0.0266^ea^ ajjhattabahiddhā citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ anupassīti...pe0... viharatīti...pe0... ātāpīti...pe0... sampajānoti...pe0... satimāti...pe0... vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti. tattha katamo loko? taṃyeva cittaṃ loko. pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko -- tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo ^a^P0.0199^ea^ rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''. tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``domanassaṃ''. iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa''nti.
[06] cittānupassanāniddeso.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu santaṃ vā ^a^V0.0224^ea^ ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ``atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ``natthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa ^a^T0.0267^ea^ kāmacchandassa pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca pahīnassa kāmacchandassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti. santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ byāpādaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ thinamiddhaṃ {thīnamiddhaṃ (sī0 syā0)} ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ vicikicchaṃ ``atthi me ajjhattaṃ vicikicchā''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ vicikicchaṃ ``natthi me ajjhattaṃ vicikicchā''ti ^a^M0.0207^ea^ pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannāya vicikicchāya uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca pahīnāya vicikicchāya āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti.

[03] santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthi me ajjhattaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``natthi me ajjhattaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti, santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ {viriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ (sī0 syā0)} ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ ^a^P0.0200^ea^ ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthi me ajjhattaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ^a^T0.0268^ea^ ``natthi me ajjhattaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā bahiddhā dhammesu cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu bahiddhā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu santaṃ vāssa kāmacchandaṃ ``atthissa kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vāssa kāmacchandaṃ ``natthissa kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti ^a^V0.0225^ea^, yathā ca uppannassa kāmacchandassa pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca pahīnassa kāmacchandassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti. santaṃ vāssa byāpādaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa thinamiddhaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa uddhaccakukkuccaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa vicikicchaṃ ``atthissa vicikicchā''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vāssa vicikicchaṃ ``natthissa vicikicchā''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannāya vicikicchāya ^a^M0.0208^ea^ uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca pahīnāya vicikicchāya āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti.

[03] santaṃ vāssa satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthissa satisambojjhaṅgo''ti ^a^T0.0269^ea^ pajānāti, asantaṃ vāssa satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``natthissa satisambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti. santaṃ vāssa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vāssa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthissa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vāssa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ^a^P0.0201^ea^ ``natthissa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevitvā bhāvetvā bahulīkaritvā svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu cittaṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu santaṃ vā kāmacchandaṃ ``atthi kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā kāmacchandaṃ ``natthi kāmacchando''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa kāmacchandassa pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti ^a^T0.0270^ea^, yathā ca pahīnassa kāmacchandassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti. santaṃ vā byāpādaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā vicikicchaṃ ``atthi vicikicchā''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā vicikicchaṃ ``natthi vicikicchā''ti ^a^V0.0226^ea^ pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannāya vicikicchāya uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca pahīnāya vicikicchāya āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti tañca pajānāti.

[03] santaṃ ^a^M0.0209^ea^ vā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthi satisambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ ``natthi satisambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti. santaṃ vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ...pe0... santaṃ vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ``atthi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ ``natthi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''ti pajānāti, yathā ca anuppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādo hoti tañca pajānāti, yathā ca uppannassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūrī hoti tañca pajānāti. evaṃ bhikkhu ajjhattabahiddhā ^a^T0.0271^ea^ dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ anupassīti. tattha katamā anupassanā? yā ^a^P0.0202^ea^ paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati anupassanā. imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``anupassī''ti.
[03] 369^b^.^eb^ viharatīti. iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 370^b^.^eb^ ātāpīti. tattha katamo ātāpo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``ātāpo''. iminā ātāpena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``ātāpī''ti.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ sampajānoti ^a^V0.0227^ea^. tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati ``sampajaññaṃ''. iminā sampajaññena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``sampajāno''ti.
[03] 372^b^.^eb^ satimāti ^a^M0.0210^ea^. tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''. imāya satiyā upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``satimā''ti.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ vineyya ^a^T0.0272^ea^ loke abhijjhādomanassanti. tattha katamo loko? teva dhammā loko. pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko. ayaṃ vuccati ``loko''. tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''. tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``domanassaṃ''. iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa''nti.
[06] dhammānupassanāniddeso.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.
[03] 374^b^.^eb^ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā -- idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati, vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati, citte cittānupassī viharati, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^P0.0203^ea^ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ ^a^V0.0228^ea^ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ kāye kāyānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati ^a^T0.0273^ea^ satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^M0.0211^ea^ bhikkhu vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati satipaṭṭhānaṃ. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu citte cittānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ citte cittānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ ^a^T0.0274^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ ^a^V0.0229^ea^ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.
[03] 380^b^.^eb^ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā -- idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati, vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati, citte cittānupassī viharati, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^M0.0212^ea^ ^a^P0.0204^ea^ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ kāye kāyānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ ^a^T0.0275^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu citte cittānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā ^a^V0.0230^ea^ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ citte cittānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ^a^T0.0276^ea^ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^M0.0213^ea^ ^a^P0.0205^ea^ bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ dhammesu dhammānupassī, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ^a^T0.0277^ea^ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā satipaṭṭhānasampayuttā.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^V0.0231^ea^ satipaṭṭhānā -- idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
[03] 387^b^.^eb^ catunnaṃ ^a^M0.0214^ea^ ^a^P0.0206^ea^ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā. siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. siyā vipākā siyā vipākadhammadhammā. anupādinnānupādāniyā. asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkāvicārā. siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā apacayagāmino, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino. siyā sekkhā, siyā asekkhā. appamāṇā. appamāṇārammaṇā. paṇītā. siyā sammattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā. na maggārammaṇā ^a^T0.0278^ea^, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā maggahetukātipi, maggādhipatinotipi. siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. bahiddhārammaṇā. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ na ^a^V0.0232^ea^ hetū. sahetukā. hetusampayuttā. na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū. na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū. na hetū sahetukā.

[03] sappaccayā. saṅkhatā. anidassanā. appaṭighā. arūpā. lokuttarā. kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā. no āsavā. anāsavā. āsavavippayuttā. na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavācātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi. na vattabbā āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttācātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavavippayuttā. anāsavā. no saṃyojanā...pe0... no ganthā...pe0... no oghā...pe0... no ^a^M0.0215^ea^ yogā...pe0... no nīvaraṇā...pe0... no parāmāsā...pe0... sārammaṇā. no cittā. cetasikā. cittasampayuttā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhā. cittasamuṭṭhānā. cittasahabhuno. cittānuparivattino. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino. bāhirā. no upādā. anupādinnā ^a^T0.0279^ea^. no upādānā...pe0... no kilesā...pe0... na dassanena pahātabbā, na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. na dassanena pahātabbahetukā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.

[03] siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā. siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā. siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā ^a^P0.0207^ea^. siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā. siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā. siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā. na kāmāvacarā. na rūpāvacarā. na arūpāvacarā. apariyāpannā. siyā niyyānikā, siyā aniyyānikā. siyā niyatā, siyā aniyatā. anuttarā. araṇāti.
[06] pañhāpucchakaṃ.
[06] satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^M0.0216^ea^ ^a^P0.0208^ea^ ^a^V0.0233^ea^ sammappadhānā -- idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ ^a^T0.0280^ea^ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? tattha katame anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā? tīṇi akusalamūlāni -- lobho, doso, moho. tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā. taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ -- ime vuccanti ``anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā''. iti imesaṃ anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā {chandīkatā (syā0)} kattukamyatā kusalo ^a^V0.0234^ea^ dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''. imaṃ chandaṃ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti {uṭṭhāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti (syā0) evamuparipi} nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chandaṃ janetī''ti.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ vāyamatīti. tattha katamo vāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ ^a^P0.0209^ea^ vuccati ``vāyāmo''. iminā vāyāmena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vāyamatī''ti.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ vīriyaṃ ^a^T0.0281^ea^ ^a^M0.0217^ea^ ārabhatīti. tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''. imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``vīriyaṃ ārabhatī''ti.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti. tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. imaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena vuccati ``cittaṃ paggaṇhātī''ti.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ padhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``padhānaṃ''. iminā padhānena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``padahatī''ti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? tattha katame uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā? tīṇi akusalamūlāni -- lobho, doso, moho. tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā. taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ -- ime vuccanti ``uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā''. iti imesaṃ uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ ^a^T0.0282^ea^ janetīti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo ^a^V0.0235^ea^ dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''. imaṃ chandaṃ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chandaṃ janetī''ti.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ vāyamatīti. tattha katamo vāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vāyāmo''. iminā vāyāmena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vāyamatī''ti.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ vīriyaṃ ^a^M0.0218^ea^ ārabhatīti. tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''. imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``vīriyaṃ ārabhatī''ti.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti. tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. imaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena vuccati ``cittaṃ paggaṇhātī''ti.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ padhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``padhānaṃ''. iminā padhānena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``padahatī''ti.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? tattha ^a^P0.0210^ea^ katame ^a^T0.0283^ea^ anuppannā kusalā dhammā? tīṇi kusalamūlāni -- alobho, adoso, amoho. taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho. taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, manokammaṃ -- ime vuccanti ``anuppannā kusalā dhammā''. iti imesaṃ anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti...pe0... vāyamatīti...pe0... vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti...pe0... cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti...pe0... padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ padhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho ^a^V0.0236^ea^ ...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``padhānaṃ''. iminā padhānena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``padahatī''ti.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? tattha katame uppannā kusalā dhammā? tīṇi kusalamūlāni -- alobho, adoso, amoho. taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho ^a^M0.0219^ea^, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ -- ime vuccanti ``uppannā kusalā dhammā''. iti imesaṃ uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ṭhitiyāti. yā ṭhiti so asammoso, yo asammoso so bhiyyobhāvo ^a^T0.0284^ea^, yo bhiyyobhāvo taṃ vepullaṃ, yaṃ vepullaṃ sā bhāvanā, yā bhāvanā sā pāripūrī.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti...pe0... vāyamatīti...pe0... vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti...pe0... cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti...pe0... padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ padhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``padhānaṃ''. iminā padhānena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``padahatī''ti.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^P0.0211^ea^ sammappadhānā -- idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ ^a^V0.0237^ea^ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ ^a^T0.0285^ea^ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā ^a^M0.0220^ea^ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''. imaṃ chandaṃ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chandaṃ janetī''ti.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ vāyamatīti. tattha katamo vāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vāyāmo''. iminā vāyāmena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vāyamatī''ti.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti. tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ ^a^P0.0212^ea^ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''. imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``vīriyaṃ ārabhatī''ti.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ cittaṃ ^a^T0.0286^ea^ paggaṇhātīti. tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu ^a^V0.0238^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. imaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena vuccati ``cittaṃ paggaṇhātī''ti.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sammappadhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā sammappadhānasampayuttā.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye ^a^M0.0221^ea^ uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ ^a^P0.0213^ea^ janetīti...pe0... vāyamatīti...pe0... vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti...pe0... cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti...pe0... padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sammappadhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā ^a^T0.0287^ea^ sammappadhānasampayuttā.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti...pe0... vāyamatīti...pe0... vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti...pe0... cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti...pe0... padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho ^a^V0.0239^ea^ ...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sammappadhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā sammappadhānasampayuttā.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya ^a^T0.0288^ea^ vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ṭhitiyāti ^a^M0.0222^ea^. yā ṭhiti so asammoso, yo asammoso so bhiyyobhāvo, yo bhiyyobhāvo taṃ vepullaṃ, yaṃ vepullaṃ sā bhāvanā, yā bhāvanā sā pāripūrī.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ chandaṃ janetīti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''. imaṃ chandaṃ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chandaṃ janetī''ti.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ vāyamatīti. tattha katamo vāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vāyāmo''. iminā vāyāmena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vāyamatī''ti.

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti. tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''. imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati ^a^P0.0214^ea^ bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``vīriyaṃ ārabhatī''ti.

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti. tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu ^a^V0.0240^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. imaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena ^a^T0.0289^ea^ vuccati ``cittaṃ paggaṇhātī''ti.

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ padahatīti. tattha katamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sammappadhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā sammappadhānasampayuttā.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sammappadhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā sammappadhānasampayuttā.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^M0.0223^ea^ sammappadhānā -- idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya...pe0... anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya...pe0... uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya ^a^T0.0290^ea^ bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
[03] 428^b^.^eb^ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ kusalāyeva ^a^V0.0241^ea^. siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. vipākadhammadhammā ^a^P0.0215^ea^. anupādinnānupādāniyā. asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkāvicārā. siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. apacayagāmino. sekkhā. appamāṇā. appamāṇārammaṇā. paṇītā. sammattaniyatā. na maggārammaṇā. maggahetukā. siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā maggādhipatinoti. siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā uppādinoti. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. bahiddhārammaṇā. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ na hetū. sahetukā. hetusampayuttā. na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū. na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū. na ^a^M0.0224^ea^ hetū sahetukā. sappaccayā. saṅkhatā. anidassanā. appaṭighā. arūpā ^a^T0.0291^ea^. lokuttarā. kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā. no āsavā. anāsavā. āsavavippayuttā. na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi. na vattabbā āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavavippayuttā. anāsavā. no saṃyojanā...pe0... no ganthā...pe0... no oghā...pe0... no yogā...pe0... no nīvaraṇā...pe0... no parāmāsā...pe0... sārammaṇā. no cittā. cetasikā. cittasampayuttā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhā. cittasamuṭṭhānā. cittasahabhuno. cittānuparivattino. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino. bāhirā. no upādā. anupādinnā. no upādānā...pe0... no kilesā...pe0... na dassanena pahātabbā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. na dassanena pahātabbahetukā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā ^a^V0.0242^ea^. siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā. siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā. siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā. siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā. siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā. na kāmāvacarā. na rūpāvacarā. na arūpāvacarā. apariyāpannā. niyyānikā. niyatā. anuttarā. araṇāti.
[06] pañhāpucchakaṃ.
[06] sammappadhānavibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ cattāro ^a^M0.0225^ea^ ^a^P0.0216^ea^ ^a^V0.0243^ea^ iddhipādā -- idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ {cittassa ekaggataṃ (sī0 syā0)} -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chandasamādhi''. so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati. ime vuccanti ``padhānasaṅkhārā''. iti ayañca chandasamādhi, ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā. tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññahitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṃ {saṅkhaṃ (sī0)} gacchati.
[03] 433^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0244^ea^ katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0217^ea^ katamo samādhi? yā ^a^T0.0293^ea^ cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ sammāsamādhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo ṭhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho ^a^M0.0226^ea^ vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca chandena, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 434^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] ``iddhipādo''ti. tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho.
[03] ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? vīriyaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ labhati cittassekaggataṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīriyasamādhi''. so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ^a^V0.0245^ea^ pahānāya...pe0... anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya...pe0... uppannānaṃ ^a^T0.0294^ea^ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati. ime vuccanti ``padhānasaṅkhārā''. iti ayañca vīriyasamādhi, ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā; tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
[03] 436^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- idaṃ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0218^ea^ katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ sammāsamādhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0227^ea^ katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca vīriyena, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 437^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti. tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho...pe0... viññāṇakkhandho.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^T0.0295^ea^ ^a^V0.0246^ea^ bhikkhu cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? cittaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ labhati cittassekaggataṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``cittasamādhi''. so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya...pe0... anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya...pe0... uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati. ime vuccanti ``padhānasaṅkhārā''. iti ayañca cittasamādhi, ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā; tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
[03] 439^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca cittena, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena ^a^P0.0219^ea^ upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 440^b^.^eb^ iddhīti ^a^M0.0228^ea^. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā ^a^T0.0296^ea^ lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti. tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho...pe0... viññāṇakkhandho.
[03] iddhipādaṃ ^a^V0.0247^ea^ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? vīmaṃsaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ labhati cittassekaggataṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīmaṃsāsamādhi''. so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya...pe0... anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya...pe0... uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati. ime vuccanti ``padhānasaṅkhārā''. iti ayañca vīmaṃsāsamādhi, ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā; tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
[03] 442^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā vīmaṃsā? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīmaṃsā''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho ^a^T0.0297^ea^ ...pe0... sammāvāyāmo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti imāya ca vīmaṃsāya, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 443^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti ^a^M0.0229^ea^ ^a^P0.0220^ea^ ^a^V0.0248^ea^. tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakhandho.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ cattāro iddhipādā -- idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ ^a^T0.0298^ea^ bhāveti.
[03] 446^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chando''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0249^ea^ katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca chandena, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 447^b^.^eb^ iddhīti ^a^M0.0230^ea^. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti ^a^P0.0221^ea^. tathābhūtassa phasso...pe0... paggāho avikkhepo.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ ^a^T0.0299^ea^ bhāveti.
[03] 449^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ vīriyaṃ? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``vīriyaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca vīriyena ^a^V0.0250^ea^, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 450^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti. tathābhūtasa phasso...pe0... paggāho avikkhepo.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^M0.0231^ea^ bhikkhu cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ ^a^P0.0222^ea^ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ ^a^T0.0300^ea^ bhāveti.
[03] 452^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti iminā ca cittena ^a^V0.0251^ea^, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti.
[03] 453^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti. tathābhūtassa phasso...pe0... paggāho avikkhepo.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ ^a^T0.0301^ea^ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
[03] 455^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0232^ea^ katamā vīmaṃsā? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīmaṃsā''.
[03] tattha katamo samādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo ^a^P0.0223^ea^ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhi''.

[03] tattha katamo padhānasaṅkhāro? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``padhānasaṅkhāro''. iti imāya ca vīmaṃsāya, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato ^a^V0.0252^ea^ upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato''ti
[03] 456^b^.^eb^ iddhīti. yā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] iddhipādoti. tathābhūtassa phasso...pe0... paggāho avikkhepo.
[03] iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti. te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī''ti.
[03] 457^b^.^eb^ cattāro iddhipādā -- chandiddhipādo, vīriyiddhipādo, cittiddhipādo, vīmaṃsiddhipādo.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo chandiddhipādo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya ^a^T0.0302^ea^ bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo tasmiṃ samaye chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando -- ayaṃ vuccati ``chandiddhipādo''. avasesā dhammā chandiddhipādasampayuttā.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vīriyiddhipādo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja ^a^M0.0233^ea^ viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīriyiddhipādo''. avasesā dhammā vīriyiddhipādasampayuttā.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo cittiddhipādo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ ^a^P0.0224^ea^ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- ayaṃ vuccati ``cittiddhipādo''. avasesā dhammā cittiddhipādasampayuttā.

[03] 461^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vīmaṃsiddhipādo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja ^a^T0.0303^ea^ viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīmaṃsiddhipādo''. avasesā dhammā vīmaṃsiddhipādasampayuttā.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 462^b^.^eb^ cattāro iddhipādā -- idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi...pe0... cittasamādhi...pe0... vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
[03] 463^b^.^eb^ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ kusalāyeva. siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. vipākadhammadhammā. anupādinnānupādāniyā. asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā ^a^M0.0234^ea^, siyā avitakkāvicārā. siyā ^a^V0.0254^ea^ pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. apacayagāmino. sekkhā. appamāṇā. appamāṇārammaṇā. paṇītā. sammattaniyatā. na maggārammaṇā, maggahetukā, na maggādhipatino. siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā uppādinoti. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi ^a^T0.0304^ea^, paccuppannārammaṇātipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. bahiddhārammaṇā. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ vīmaṃsiddhipādo ^a^P0.0225^ea^ hetu, tayo iddhipādā na hetū. sahetukā. hetusampayuttā. vīmaṃsiddhipādo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, tayo iddhipādā na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū. vīmaṃsiddhipādo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, tayo iddhipādā na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū. tayo iddhipādā na hetū sahetukā, vīmaṃsiddhipādo na vattabbo na hetu sahetukotipi, na hetu ahetukotipi. sappaccayā. saṅkhatā. anidassanā. appaṭighā. arūpā. lokuttarā. kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā. no āsavā. anāsavā. āsavavippayuttā. na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi. na vattabbā āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavavippayuttā. anāsavā.

[03] no saṃyojanā...pe0... no ganthā...pe0... no oghā...pe0... no yogā...pe0... no nīvaraṇā...pe0... no parāmāsā...pe0... sārammaṇā. tayo iddhipādā no cittā, cittiddhipādo ^a^T0.0305^ea^ cittaṃ. tayo iddhipādā cetasikā, cittiddhipādo acetasiko. tayo iddhipādā cittasampayuttā, cittiddhipādo na vattabbo cittena sampayuttotipi, cittena vippayuttotipi. tayo iddhipādā cittasaṃsaṭṭhā, cittiddhipādo na vattabbo cittena saṃsaṭṭhotipi, cittena visaṃsaṭṭhotipi. tayo iddhipādā cittasamuṭṭhānā, cittiddhipādo no cittasamuṭṭhāno ^a^M0.0235^ea^. tayo iddhipādā cittasahabhuno, cittiddhipādo no cittasahabhū. tayo iddhipādā cittānuparivattino ^a^V0.0255^ea^, cittiddhipādo no cittānuparivatti. tayo iddhipādā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno. tayo iddhipādā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū. tayo iddhipādā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti.

[03] tayo iddhipādā bāhirā, cittiddhipādo ajjhattiko. no upādā. anupādinnā. no upādānā...pe0... no kilesā...pe0... na dassanena pahātabbā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. na dassanena pahātabbahetukā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā. siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā ^a^P0.0226^ea^. siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā. siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā. siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā. siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā. na kāmāvacarā ^a^T0.0306^ea^. na rūpāvacarā. na arūpāvacarā. apariyāpannā. niyyānikā. niyatā. anuttarā. araṇāti.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^M0.0236^ea^ ^a^P0.0227^ea^ ^a^V0.0256^ea^ bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
[03] 467^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``satisambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] so tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṃsamāpajjati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsamāpajjato āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīriyasambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] āraddhavīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pītisambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``passaddhisambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] passaddhakāyassa ^a^V0.0257^ea^ sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhisambojjhaṅgo'' ^a^T0.0307^ea^.
[03] so tathā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] 468^b^.^eb^ satta bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0228^ea^ katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati. yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi bahiddhā ^a^M0.0237^ea^ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

[03] tattha katamo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo? atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo. yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

[03] tattha katamo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo? atthi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ, atthi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ. yadapi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati ^a^T0.0308^ea^.

[03] tattha katamo pītisambojjhaṅgo? atthi savitakkasavicārā pīti, atthi avitakkāvicārā pīti. yadapi savitakkasavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi avitakkāvicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0258^ea^ katamo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo? atthi kāyapassaddhi {kāyappassaddhi (syā0 ka0)}, atthi cittapassaddhi {cittappassaddhi (syā0 ka0)}. yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

[03] tattha katamo samādhisambojjhaṅgo? atthi savitakko savicāro samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi. yadapi savitakko savicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi avitakko avicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

[03] tattha katamo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo? atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā. yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. yadapi ^a^M0.0238^ea^ bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi ^a^T0.0309^ea^ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
[03] 470^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^P0.0229^ea^ bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? idha bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti...pe0... vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti... pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti... passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti... samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti... upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.
[03] 472^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^V0.0259^ea^ bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ tattha katame satta bojjhaṅgā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti -- satisambojjhaṅgo...pe0... upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
[03] 474^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``satisambojjhaṅgo''.

[03] tattha ^a^T0.0310^ea^ ^a^M0.0239^ea^ katamo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] tattha katamo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vīriyasambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] tattha katamo pītisambojjhaṅgo? yā pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ {odaggaṃ (sī0) dha0 sa0 9} attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pītisambojjhaṅgo''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0230^ea^ katamo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo? yā vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhitattaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``passaddhisambojjhaṅgo''.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0260^ea^ katamo samādhisambojjhaṅgo? yā cittassa ṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``samādhisambojjhaṅgo''.

[03] tattha katamo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo? yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''. ime vuccanti satta bojjhaṅgā. avasesā dhammā sattahi bojjhaṅgehi ^a^T0.0311^ea^ sampayuttā.
[03] 475^b^.^eb^ satta bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo...pe0... upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``satisambojjhaṅgo''. avasesā dhammā satisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā ^a^M0.0240^ea^ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo''. avasesā dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgasampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ ^a^V0.0262^ea^ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo'' ^a^T0.0314^ea^. avasesā dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgasampayuttā.
