[03] 482^b^.^eb^ satta bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
[03] 483^b^.^eb^ sattannaṃ ^a^M0.0242^ea^ bojjhaṅgānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā. pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto; cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā. anupādinnānupādāniyā. asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkāvicārā. pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato; cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena ^a^V0.0263^ea^ na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā apacayagāmino, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino. siyā sekkhā, siyā asekkhā. appamāṇā. appamāṇārammaṇā. paṇītā. siyā sammattaniyatā ^a^P0.0233^ea^, siyā aniyatā. na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino; siyā na vattabbā maggahetukātipi, maggādhipatinotipi. siyā uppannā, siyā ^a^T0.0315^ea^ anuppannā, siyā uppādino. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. bahiddhārammaṇā. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu, cha bojjhaṅgā hetusampayuttā. dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū. dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū. cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo na vattabbo na hetusahetukotipi, na hetuahetukotipi. sappaccayā. saṅkhatā. anidassanā. appaṭighā. arūpā. lokuttarā. kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci ^a^M0.0243^ea^ na viññeyyā. no āsavā. anāsavā āsavavippayuttā. na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavavippayuttā. anāsavā. no saṃyojanā...pe0... no ganthā...pe0... no oghā...pe0... no yogā...pe0... no nīvaraṇā...pe0... no parāmāsā...pe0... sārammaṇā. no cittā. cetasikā. cittasampayuttā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ^a^T0.0316^ea^. cittasamuṭṭhānā. cittasahabhuno. cittānuparivattino. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino. bāhirā. no upādā. anupādinnā. no upādānā...pe0... no kilesā...pe0... na dassanena pahātabbā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. na dassanena pahātabbahetukā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā. siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā.

[03] pītisambojjhaṅgo ^a^V0.0264^ea^ appītiko, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā. pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā. pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā ^a^P0.0234^ea^ sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā. pītisambojjhaṅgo na upekkhāsahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā. na kāmāvacarā. na rūpāvacarā. na arūpāvacarā. apariyāpannā. siyā niyyānikā, siyā aniyyānikā. siyā niyatā, siyā aniyatā. anuttarā. araṇāti.
[06] pañhāpucchakaṃ.
[06] bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ariyo ^a^T0.0317^ea^ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ ^a^P0.0235^ea^ ^a^V0.0265^ea^ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
[03] 487^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā sammādiṭṭhi? dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammādiṭṭhi''.
[03] tattha katamo sammāsaṅkappo? nekkhammasaṅkappo, abyāpādasaṅkappo, avihiṃsāsaṅkappo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsaṅkappo''.
[03] tattha katamā sammāvācā? musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāvācā''.
[03] tattha katamo sammākammanto? pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammākammanto''.
[03] tattha katamo sammāājīvo? idha ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāājīvo''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0266^ea^ katamo sammāvāyāmo? idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ^a^T0.0318^ea^ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāvāyāmo''.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0236^ea^ katamā sammāsati? idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, vedanāsu ^a^M0.0245^ea^ vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsati''.

[03] tattha katamo sammāsamādhi? idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ^a^T0.0319^ea^ ācikkhanti ``upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī''ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsamādhi''.
[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā sammādiṭṭhi? idha bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ ^a^V0.0267^ea^ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ, sammāsaṅkappaṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāvācaṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammākammantaṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāājīvaṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāvāyāmaṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāsatiṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.
[03] 490^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0246^ea^ katamo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ ^a^P0.0237^ea^ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0320^ea^ katamā sammādiṭṭhi? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammādiṭṭhi''.
[03] tattha katamo sammāsaṅkappo? yo takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsaṅkappo''.

[03] tattha katamā sammāvācā? yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāvācā''.

[03] tattha katamo sammākammanto? yā tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī ^a^V0.0268^ea^ akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammākammanto''.

[03] tattha katamo sammāājīvo? yā micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāājīvo''.
[03] tattha katamo sammāvāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ ^a^T0.0321^ea^ vuccati ``sammāvāyāmo''.
[03] tattha katamā sammāsati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsati''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0247^ea^ katamo sammāsamādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsamādhi''. ayaṃ vuccati ``aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''. avasesā dhammā aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sampayuttā.
[03] 493^b^.^eb^ pañcaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0238^ea^ katamo pañcaṅgiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0269^ea^ katamā sammādiṭṭhi? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammādiṭṭhi''.
[03] tattha katamo sammāsaṅkappo? yo takko vitakko...pe0... sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsaṅkappo''.
[03] tattha katamo ^a^T0.0322^ea^ sammāvāyāmo? yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāvāyāmo''.
[03] tattha katamā sammāsati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsati''.

[03] tattha katamo sammāsamādhi? yā cittassa ṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsamādhi''. ayaṃ vuccati ``pañcaṅgiko maggo''. avasesā dhammā pañcaṅgikena maggena sampayuttā.
[03] 496^b^.^eb^ pañcaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0248^ea^ katamā sammādiṭṭhi? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammādiṭṭhi''. avasesā dhammā sammādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāsaṅkappena sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāvāyāmena sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāsatiyā sampayuttā.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0239^ea^ katamo sammāsamādhi? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya ^a^T0.0323^ea^ paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye ^a^V0.0270^ea^ cittassa ṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsamādhi''. avasesā dhammā sammāsamādhinā sampayuttā.
[03] 498^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi. ayaṃ vuccati ``aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''. avasesā dhammā aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sampayuttā.
[03] 500^b^.^eb^ pañcaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo pañcaṅgiko maggo? idha ^a^P0.0240^ea^ bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ ^a^T0.0324^ea^ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati ^a^M0.0249^ea^ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi. ayaṃ vuccati ``pañcaṅgiko maggo''. avasesā dhammā pañcaṅgikena maggena sampayuttā.
[03] 502^b^.^eb^ pañcaṅgiko maggo -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0271^ea^ katamā sammādiṭṭhi? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammādiṭṭhi''. avasesā dhammā sammādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāsaṅkappena ^a^T0.0325^ea^ sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāvāyāmena sampayuttā...pe0... avasesā dhammā sammāsatiyā sampayuttā.

[01] tattha katamo sammāsamādhi? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo ^a^P0.0241^ea^ hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā ^a^M0.0250^ea^ samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sammāsamādhi''. avasesā dhammā sammāsamādhinā sampayuttā.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.
[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
[03] 505^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhannaṃ ^a^V0.0272^ea^ maggaṅgānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā. sammāsaṅkappo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto; satta maggaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā ^a^T0.0326^ea^, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā. anupādinnānupādāniyā. asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. sammāsaṅkappo avitakkavicāramatto; satta maggaṅgā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkāvicārā. sammāsaṅkappo pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato; satta maggaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā apacayagāmino, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino. siyā sekkhā, siyā asekkhā. appamāṇā. appamāṇārammaṇā. paṇītā. siyā sammattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā. na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino; siyā na vattabbā maggahetukātipi, maggādhipatinotipi. siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā ^a^M0.0251^ea^ paccuppannā. na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. bahiddhārammaṇā. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ sammādiṭṭhi ^a^P0.0242^ea^ hetu, satta maggaṅgā na hetū. sahetukā. hetusampayuttā. sammādiṭṭhi hetu ceva sahetukā ca, satta maggaṅgā na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū. sammādiṭṭhi hetu ceva hetusampayuttā ca, satta maggaṅgā ^a^T0.0327^ea^ na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū. satta maggaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, sammādiṭṭhi na vattabbā na hetu sahetukātipi, na hetu ahetukātipi.
[03] sappaccayā ^a^V0.0273^ea^. saṅkhatā. anidassanā. appaṭighā. arūpā. lokuttarā. kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā.

[03] no āsavā. anāsavā. āsavavippayuttā. na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi. na vattabbā āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi. āsavavippayuttā. anāsavā.

[03] no saṃyojanā...pe0... no ganthā...pe0... no oghā...pe0... no yogā...pe0... no nīvaraṇā...pe0... no parāmāsā...pe0... sārammaṇā. no cittā. cetasikā. cittasampayuttā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhā. cittasamuṭṭhānā. cittasahabhuno. cittānuparivattino. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno. cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino. bāhirā. no upādā. anupādinnā.

[03] no upādānā...pe0... no kilesā...pe0... na dassanena pahātabbā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. na dassanena pahātabbahetukā. na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. sammāsaṅkappo avitakko, satta maggaṅgā siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā. sammāsaṅkappo savicāro, satta maggaṅgā siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā. sammāsaṅkappo sappītiko ^a^M0.0252^ea^, satta maggaṅgā siyā ^a^T0.0328^ea^ sappītikā, siyā appītikā. sammāsaṅkappo pītisahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā. sammāsaṅkappo sukhasahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā. sammāsaṅkappo na upekkhāsahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā. na ^a^P0.0243^ea^ kāmāvacarā. na rūpāvacarā. na arūpāvacarā. apariyāpannā. siyā niyyānikā, siyā aniyyānikā. siyā niyatā, siyā aniyatā. anuttarā. araṇāti.
[06] pañhāpucchakaṃ.
[06] maggaṅgavibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ idha ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ^a^P0.0244^ea^ ^a^V0.0274^ea^ bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto sātaccaṃ nepakkaṃ bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto. so abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti, ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite {sammiñjite (sī0 syā0)} pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī ^a^T0.0329^ea^ hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti. so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ {manussarāhaseyyakaṃ (sī0 syā0)} paṭisallānasāruppaṃ. so araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā. so abhijjhaṃ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodheti. byāpādapadosaṃ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodheti. thinamiddhaṃ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodheti. uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto ^a^P0.0245^ea^, uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṃ parisodheti. vicikicchaṃ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṃkathī kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchāya cittaṃ parisodheti. so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe vivicceva kāmehi ^a^V0.0275^ea^ vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicārānaṃ ^a^M0.0254^ea^ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti ^a^T0.0330^ea^ -- ``upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī''ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati; sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ``ananto ākāso''ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati; sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ``anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati; sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ``natthi kiñcī''ti ākiñcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati; sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ``idhā''ti imissā diṭṭhiyā, imissā khantiyā, imissā ruciyā, imasmiṃ ādāye, imasmiṃ dhamme, imasmiṃ vinaye, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, imasmiṃ pāvacane, imasmiṃ brahmacariye, imasmiṃ satthusāsane. tena vuccati ``idhā''ti.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``bhikkhū''ti samaññāya bhikkhu, paṭiññāya bhikkhu, bhikkhatīti bhikkhu, bhikkhakoti bhikkhu, bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu, bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu, bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu, bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhu, odhiso ^a^P0.0246^ea^ kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu, anodhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu, sekkho bhikkhu, asekkho bhikkhu, nevasekkhanāsekkho ^a^T0.0331^ea^ bhikkhu, aggo bhikkhu, bhadro bhikkhu, maṇḍo bhikkhu, sāro bhikkhu, samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampanno bhikkhu.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ ``pātimokkha''nti sīlaṃ patiṭṭhā ādi caraṇaṃ saṃyamo saṃvaro mokkhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā. saṃvaroti. kāyiko ^a^M0.0255^ea^ avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo ^a^V0.0276^ea^, kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. saṃvutoti. iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati ``pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto''ti.
[03] 512^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 513^b^.^eb^ ``ācāragocarasampanno''ti atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro.

[03] tattha katamo anācāro? kāyiko vītikkamo, vācasiko vītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``anācāro''. sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro. idhekacco veḷudānena vā pattadānena vā pupphadānena vā phaladānena vā sinānadānena vā dantakaṭṭhadānena vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasūpyatāya {muggasuppatāya (sī0)} vā pāribhaṭayatāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``anācāro''.

[03] tattha katamo ācāro? kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``ācāro'' ^a^T0.0332^ea^. sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro ācāro. idhekacco na veḷudānena na pattadānena na pupphadānena na phaladānena na sinānadānena na dantakaṭṭhadānena na cāṭukamyatāya na muggasūpyatāya na pāribhaṭayatāya na jaṅghapesanikena na aññataraññatarena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``ācāro''.
[03] 514^b^.^eb^ ``gocaro''ti atthi gocaro, atthi agocaro.

[03] tattha katamo agocaro? idhekacco ^a^P0.0247^ea^ vesiyāgocaro vā hoti vidhavāgocaro vā thullakumārigocaro vā paṇḍakagocaro vā bhikkhunigocaro vā pānāgāragocaro vā, saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena ^a^M0.0256^ea^; yāni vā ^a^V0.0277^ea^ pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni ahitakāmāni aphāsukakāmāni ayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati payirupāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``agocaro''.

[03] tattha katamo gocaro? idhekacco na vesiyāgocaro hoti na vidhavāgocaro na thullakumārigocaro na paṇḍakagocaro na bhikkhunigocaro na pānāgāragocaro, asaṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena; yāni vā pana tāni kulāni saddhāni pasannāni opānabhūtāni kāsāvapajjotāni isivātapaṭivātāni atthakāmāni hitakāmāni phāsukakāmāni yogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati payirupāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ^a^T0.0333^ea^ ``gocaro''. iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``ācāragocarasampanno''ti.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ ``aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī''ti tattha katame aṇumattā vajjā? yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni oramattakāni lahusāni lahusammatāni saṃyamakaraṇīyāni saṃvarakaraṇīyāni cittuppādakaraṇīyāni manasikārapaṭibaddhāni -- ime vuccanti ``aṇumattā vajjā''. iti imesu aṇumattesu vajjesu vajjadassāvī ca hoti bhayadassāvī ca ādīnavadassāvī ca nissaraṇadassāvī ca. tena vuccati ``aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī''ti.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ ``samādāya ^a^P0.0248^ea^ sikkhati sikkhāpadesū''ti tattha katamā sikkhā? catasso sikkhā -- bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhusikkhā, bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhunisikkhā, upāsakānaṃ upāsakasikkhā, upāsikānaṃ upāsikasikkhā. imā vuccanti ``sikkhāyo''. iti imāsu sikkhāsu sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ samādāya vattati. tena vuccati ``samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū''ti.
[03] 517^b^.^eb^ ``indriyesu guttadvāro''ti atthi indriyesu guttadvāratā, atthi aguttadvāratā.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0257^ea^ ^a^V0.0278^ea^ katamā indriyesu aguttadvāratā? idhekacco cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī. yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā...pe0... jivhāya ^a^T0.0334^ea^ rasaṃ sāyitvā...pe0... kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī. yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati manindriyaṃ, manindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. yā imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ agutti agopanā anārakkho asaṃvaro -- ayaṃ vuccati ``indriyesu aguttadvāratā''.

[03] tattha katamā indriyesu guttadvāratā? idhekacco cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī. yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā...pe0... jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā...pe0... kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī. ñatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati manindriyaṃ, manindriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. yā imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ gutti gopanā ārakkho saṃvaro -- ayaṃ vuccati ``indriyesu ^a^P0.0249^ea^ guttadvāratā''. imāya indriyesu guttadvāratāya upeto hoti samupeto...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``indriyesu guttadvāro''ti.
[03] 518^b^.^eb^ ``bhojane mattaññū''ti atthi bhojane mattaññutā, atthi bhojane amattaññutā.

[03] tattha katamā bhojane amattaññutā? idhekacco appaṭisaṅkhā ayoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti davāya madāya maṇḍanāya vibhūsanāya. yā tattha asantuṭṭhitā amattaññutā appaṭisaṅkhā bhojane -- ayaṃ vuccati ``bhojane amattaññutā''ti.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0258^ea^ ^a^V0.0279^ea^ katamā bhojane mattaññutā? idhekacco paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti -- ``neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya, iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsu vihāro cā''ti. yā tattha santuṭṭhitā mattaññutā paṭisaṅkhā bhojane -- ayaṃ vuccati ``bhojane mattaññutā''. imāya bhojane mattaññutāya upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``bhojane mattaññū''ti.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto hoti? idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti, rattiyā paṭhamayāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti, rattiyā majjhimayāmaṃ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ {pādena pādaṃ (syā0)} accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvā, rattiyā pacchimayāmaṃ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti. evaṃ bhikkhu ^a^T0.0336^ea^ pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto.
[03] 520^b^.^eb^ ``sātacca''nti. yo cetasiko vīriyārambho...pe0... sammāvāyāmo.
[03] 521^b^.^eb^ ``nepakka''nti. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ``bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto''ti. tattha katame bodhipakkhikā dhammā? satta bojjhaṅgā -- satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo ^a^P0.0250^ea^. ime vuccanti ``bodhipakkhikā dhammā''. iti te bodhipakkhike dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tena vuccati ``bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto''ti.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ kathañca ^a^M0.0259^ea^ bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti, ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti ^a^V0.0280^ea^, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī hoti; gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti? idha bhikkhu sato sampajāno abhikkamati, sato sampajāno paṭikkamati, sato sampajāno āloketi, sato sampajāno viloketi, sato sampajāno samiñjeti, sato sampajāno pasāreti, sato sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe ^a^T0.0337^ea^ sato sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sato sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme sato sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sato sampajānakārī hotīti.
[03] 524^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammusanatā sati satindriyaṃ satibalaṃ sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ ``sampajāno''ti tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati ``sampajaññaṃ''. iti imāya ca satiyā iminā ca sampajaññena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. evaṃ bhikkhu sato sampajāno abhikkamati, sato sampajāno paṭikkamati, sato sampajāno āloketi, sato sampajāno viloketi, sato sampajāno samiñjeti, sato sampajāno pasāreti, sato sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sato sampajānakārī ^a^P0.0251^ea^ hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sato sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme sato sampajānakārī ^a^M0.0260^ea^ hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ``vivitta''nti ^a^T0.0338^ea^ santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi. tena taṃ vivittaṃ. dūre cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi. tena taṃ vivittaṃ.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ``senāsana''nti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi senāsanaṃ, bhisipi senāsanaṃ, bibbohanampi ^a^V0.0281^ea^ {bimbohanampi (sī0 syā0)} senāsanaṃ, vihāropi senāsanaṃ, aḍḍhayogopi senāsanaṃ, pāsādopi senāsanaṃ, aṭṭopi senāsanaṃ, māḷopi senāsanaṃ, leṇampi senāsanaṃ, guhāpi senāsanaṃ, rukkhamūlampi senāsanaṃ, veḷugumbopi senāsanaṃ. yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti sabbametaṃ senāsanaṃ.
[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ``vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī''ti imaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati sambhajati sevati nisevati saṃsevati. tena vuccati ``vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī''ti.
[03] 529^b^.^eb^ ``arañña''nti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ araññaṃ.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ ``rukkhamūla''nti rukkhamūlaṃyeva rukkhamūlaṃ. pabbatoyeva pabbato. kandarāyeva kandarā. giriguhāyeva giriguhā. susānaṃyeva susānaṃ. abbhokāsoyeva abbhokāso. palālapuñjoyeva palālapuñjo.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ``vanapattha''nti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti vanasaṇḍānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti bhīsanakānametaṃ {bhiṃsanakānametaṃ (sī0 syā0)} senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti salomahaṃsānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti pariyantānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ``vanapattha''nti durabhisambhavānametaṃ ^a^T0.0339^ea^ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ``appasadda''nti ^a^M0.0261^ea^ santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi. tena taṃ appasaddaṃ. dūre cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi. tena taṃ appasaddaṃ.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ``appanigghosa''nti yadeva taṃ appasaddaṃ tadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ. yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ tadeva ^a^P0.0252^ea^ taṃ vijanavātaṃ. yadeva taṃ vijanavātaṃ tadeva taṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ. yadeva taṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ tadeva taṃ paṭisallānasāruppaṃ.
[03] 534^b^.^eb^ ``araññagato ^a^V0.0282^ea^ vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā''ti araññagato vā hoti rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā.
[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ``nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā''ti nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā.
[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ``ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā''ti ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihito.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ``parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā''ti tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati paṭissati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''. ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā. tena vuccati ``parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā''ti.
[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ``abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā''ti tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo rāgo ^a^T0.0340^ea^ sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''.

[03] tattha katamo loko? pañcupādānakkhandhā loko -- ayaṃ vuccati ``loko''. ayaṃ abhijjhā imamhi loke santā hoti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā''ti.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ``vigatābhijjhena cetasā''ti tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ vigatābhijjhaṃ hoti. tena vuccati ``vigatābhijjhena cetasā''ti.
[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^M0.0262^ea^ iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 541^b^.^eb^ ``abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti tattha katamā abhijjhā? yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``abhijjhā''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0283^ea^ katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imāya abhijjhāya sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti. tena vuccati ``abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti.
[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ``byāpādapadosaṃ ^a^P0.0253^ea^ pahāyā''ti atthi byāpādo, atthi padoso.

[03] tattha katamo byāpādo? yo cittassa āghāto paṭighāto paṭighaṃ paṭivirodho kopo pakopo sampakopo doso padoso sampadoso cittassa byāpatti manopadoso kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ doso ^a^T0.0341^ea^ dussanā dussitattaṃ {dūsanā dūsitattaṃ (syā0)} byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``byāpādo''.

[03] tattha katamo padoso? yo byāpādo so padoso, yo padoso so byāpādo. iti ayañca byāpādo ayañca padoso santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyā''ti.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ``abyāpannacitto''ti tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ abyāpannaṃ hoti. tena vuccati ``abyāpannacitto''ti.
[03] 544^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ``byāpādapadosā ^a^M0.0263^ea^ cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti. atthi byāpādo atthi padoso.
[03] tattha katamo byāpādo? yo cittassa āghāto...pe0... caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``byāpādo''.
[03] tattha katamo padoso? yo byāpādo so padoso, yo padoso so byāpādo.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0284^ea^ katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ ^a^T0.0342^ea^ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā byāpādapadosā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti. tena vuccati ``byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti.
[03] 546^b^.^eb^ ``thinamiddhaṃ pahāyā''ti atthi thinaṃ {thīnaṃ (sī0 syā0)}, atthi middhaṃ.
[03] tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnaṃ līyanā līyitattaṃ thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ {thīyanā thīyitattaṃ (sī0 syā0)} cittassa -- idaṃ vuccati ``thinaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? yā ^a^P0.0254^ea^ kāyassa akalyatā akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho antosamorodho middhaṃ suppaṃ pacalāyikā suppaṃ suppanā suppitattaṃ -- idaṃ vuccati ``middhaṃ''. iti idañca thinaṃ idañca middhaṃ santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``thinamiddhaṃ pahāyā''ti.
[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ``vigatathinamiddho''ti. tassa thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā pahīnapaṭinissaṭṭhattā. tena vuccati ``vigatathinamiddho''ti.
[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ``ālokasaññī''ti. tattha katamā saññā? yā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``saññā''. ayaṃ saññā ālokā hoti ^a^M0.0264^ea^ vivaṭā parisuddhā pariyodātā. tena vuccati ``ālokasaññī''ti.
[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ``sato sampajāno''ti. tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati ^a^T0.0343^ea^ ...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi ^a^V0.0285^ea^ -- idaṃ vuccati ``sampajaññaṃ''. iti imāya ca satiyā iminā ca sampajaññena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``sato sampajāno''ti.
[03] 551^b^.^eb^ ``thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti. atthi thinaṃ, atthi middhaṃ.
[03] tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``thinaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``middhaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti. tena vuccati ``thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti.
[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ``uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahāyā''ti atthi uddhaccaṃ, atthi kukkuccaṃ.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0255^ea^ katamaṃ uddhaccaṃ? yaṃ cittassa uddhaccaṃ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṃ cittassa -- idaṃ vuccati ``uddhaccaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ kukkuccaṃ? akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā, avajje vajjasaññitā, vajje avajjasaññitā, yaṃ evarūpaṃ kukkuccaṃ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekhā -- idaṃ vuccati ``kukkuccaṃ''. iti idañca uddhaccaṃ idañca kukkuccaṃ ^a^T0.0344^ea^ santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahāyā''ti.
[03] 553^b^.^eb^ ``anuddhato''ti tassa uddhaccakukkuccassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā pahīnapaṭinissaṭṭhattā. tena vuccati ``anuddhato''ti.
[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^V0.0286^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ ``vūpasantacitto''ti ^a^M0.0265^ea^. tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ santaṃ hoti samitaṃ vūpasantaṃ. tena vuccati ``ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto''ti.
[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ``uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti atthi uddhaccaṃ, atthi kukkuccaṃ.
[03] tattha katamaṃ uddhaccaṃ? yaṃ cittassa uddhaccaṃ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṃ cittassa -- idaṃ vuccati ``uddhaccaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ kukkuccaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``kukkuccaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā uddhaccakukkuccā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti. tena vuccati ``uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ ``vicikicchaṃ pahāyā''ti, tattha katamā vicikicchā? yā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā ^a^T0.0345^ea^ kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvidhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhaṇā chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vicikicchā''. ayaṃ vicikicchā ^a^P0.0256^ea^ santā hoti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vicikicchaṃ pahāyā''ti.
[03] 558^b^.^eb^ ``tiṇṇavicikiccho''ti, imaṃ vicikicchaṃ tiṇṇo hoti uttiṇṇo nittiṇṇo pāraṅgato pāramanuppatto. tena vuccati ``tiṇṇavicikiccho''ti.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ``akathaṃkathī kusalesu dhammesū''ti imāya vicikicchāya kusalesu dhammesu na kaṅkhati ^a^V0.0287^ea^ na vicikicchati akathaṃkathī hoti nikkathaṃkathī vikathaṃkatho. tena vuccati ``akathaṃkathī kusalesu dhammesū''ti.
[03] 560^b^.^eb^ ``vicikicchāya cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti, tattha katamā vicikicchā? yā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vicikicchā''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0266^ea^ katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu -- idaṃ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imāya vicikicchāya sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti. tena vuccati ``vicikicchāya cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ ``ime^a^T0.0346^ea^ pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā''ti ime pañca nīvaraṇā santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā''ti.
[03] 562^b^.^eb^ ``cetaso upakkilese''ti ime pañca nīvaraṇā cittassa upakkilesā.
[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ``paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe''ti imehi pañcahi nīvaraṇehi anuppannā ceva paññā na uppajjati uppannā ca paññā nirujjhati. tena vuccati ``paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe''ti.
[03] 564^b^.^eb^ ``vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī''ti tattha katame kāmā? chando kāmo, rāgo kāmo, chandarāgo kāmo, saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo kāmo -- ime vuccanti ``kāmā''.

[03] tattha katame akusalā dhammā? kāmacchando, byāpādo, thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, vicikicchā -- ime vuccanti ``akusalā dhammā''. iti ^a^P0.0257^ea^ imehi ca kāmehi imehi ca akusalehi dhammehi vivitto hoti. tena vuccati ``vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī''ti.
[03] 565^b^.^eb^ ``savitakkaṃ ^a^V0.0288^ea^ savicāra''nti atthi vitakko, atthi vicāro.
[03] tattha katamo vitakko? yo takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vitakko''.

[03] tattha katamo vicāro? yo cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa ^a^T0.0347^ea^ anusandhanatā anupekkhanatā -- ayaṃ vuccati vicāro. iti ^a^M0.0267^ea^ iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``savitakkaṃ savicāra''nti.
[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ``vivekaja''nti vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā -- te imasmiṃ viveke jātā honti sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā. tena vuccati ``vivekaja''nti.
[03] 567^b^.^eb^ ``pītisukha''nti atthi pīti, atthi sukhaṃ.
[03] tattha katamā pīti? yā pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pīti''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ sukhaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``sukhaṃ''. idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ. tena vuccati ``pītisukha''nti.
[03] 568^b^.^eb^ ``paṭhama''nti gaṇanānupubbatā {gaṇanānupubbato (syā0) evamuparipi} paṭhamaṃ. idaṃ paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti paṭhamaṃ.
[03] 569^b^.^eb^ ``jhāna''nti vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā.
[03] 570^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti yo paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 571^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^V0.0289^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 572^b^.^eb^ ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā''ti, atthi vitakko, atthi vicāro.
[03] tattha ^a^T0.0348^ea^ katamo vitakko? yo takko vitakko...pe0... sammāsaṅkappo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vitakko''.

[03] tattha katamo vicāro? yo ^a^P0.0258^ea^ cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhanatā anupekkhanatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vicāro''. iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā ^a^M0.0268^ea^ abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā''ti.
[03] 573^b^.^eb^ ``ajjhatta''nti yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ.
[03] 574^b^.^eb^ ``sampasādana''nti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo.
[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ``cetaso ekodibhāva''nti yā cittassa ṭhiti...pe0... sammāsamādhi.
[03] 576^b^.^eb^ ``avitakkaṃ avicāra''nti atthi vitakko, atthi vicāro.
[03] tattha katamo vitakko? yo takko vitakko...pe0... sammāsaṅkappo -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vitakko''.

[03] tattha katamo vicāro? yo cāro anucāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhanatā anupekkhanatā -- ayaṃ vuccati ``vicāro''. iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā hoti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``avitakkaṃ avicāra''nti.
[03] 577^b^.^eb^ ``samādhija''nti ^a^V0.0290^ea^ sampasādo pītisukhaṃ -- te imasmiṃ samādhimhi jātā honti sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā. tena vuccati ``samādhija''nti.
[03] 578^b^.^eb^ ``pītisukha''nti ^a^T0.0349^ea^ atthi pīti, atthi sukhaṃ.
[03] tattha katamā pīti...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati ``pīti''.
[03] tattha katamaṃ sukhaṃ...pe0... idaṃ vuccati ``sukhaṃ''. idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ. tena vuccati ``pītisukha''nti.
[03] 579^b^.^eb^ ``dutiya''nti gaṇanānupubbatā dutiyaṃ. idaṃ dutiyaṃ samāpajjatīti dutiyaṃ.
[03] 580^b^.^eb^ ``jhāna''nti sampasādo, pītisukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā.
[03] 581^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti ^a^M0.0269^ea^ yo dutiyassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 582^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^P0.0259^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.

[03] 583^b^.^eb^ ``pītiyā ca virāgā''ti tattha katamā pīti? yā pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``pīti''. ayaṃ pīti santā hoti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``pītiyā ca virāgā''ti.

[03] 584^b^.^eb^ ``upekkhako''ti tattha katamā upekkhā? yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhā''. imāya upekkhāya upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``upekkhako''ti.
[03] 585^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^T0.0350^ea^ ^a^V0.0291^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 586^b^.^eb^ ``sato ca sampajāno''ti tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati ``sampajaññaṃ''. iti imāya ca satiyā iminā ca sampajaññena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato. tena vuccati ``sato ca sampajāno''ti.

[03] 587^b^.^eb^ ``sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī''ti tattha katamaṃ sukhaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``sukhaṃ''.
[03] tattha katamo kāyo? saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho -- ayaṃ vuccati ``kāyo''. idaṃ sukhaṃ iminā kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti. tena vuccati ``sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī''ti.

[03] 588^b^.^eb^ ``yaṃ ^a^M0.0270^ea^ taṃ ariyā ācikkhantī''ti tattha katame ariyā? ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca. te imaṃ ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti {paññāpenti (sī0 syā0)} paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttāniṃ karonti pakāsenti. tena vuccati ``yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhantī''ti.
[03] 589^b^.^eb^ ``upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī''ti tattha katamā upekkhā? yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhā''.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0260^ea^ katamā sati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati ^a^T0.0351^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ sukhaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ ^a^V0.0292^ea^ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``sukhaṃ''. iti imāya ca upekkhāya imāya ca satiyā iminā ca sukhena samannāgato iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī''ti.
[03] 590^b^.^eb^ ``tatiya''nti gaṇanānupubbatā tatiyaṃ. idaṃ tatiyaṃ samāpajjatīti tatiyaṃ.
[03] 591^b^.^eb^ ``jhāna''nti upekkhā, sati, sampajaññaṃ, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā.
[03] 592^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti yo tatiyassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 593^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 594^b^.^eb^ ``sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā''ti, atthi sukhaṃ, atthi dukkhaṃ.
[03] tattha katamaṃ sukhaṃ? yaṃ kāyikaṃ sātaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``sukhaṃ''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0271^ea^ katamaṃ dukkhaṃ? yaṃ kāyikaṃ asātaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``dukkhaṃ''. iti idañca sukhaṃ idañca dukkhaṃ santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā ^a^T0.0352^ea^ appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā''ti.
[03] 595^b^.^eb^ ``pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā''ti atthi somanassaṃ, atthi domanassaṃ.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0293^ea^ katamaṃ somanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``somanassaṃ''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā -- idaṃ vuccati ``domanassaṃ''. iti idañca somanassaṃ idañca domanassaṃ pubbeva santā ^a^P0.0261^ea^ honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā''ti.
[03] 596^b^.^eb^ ``adukkhamasukha''nti yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā. tena vuccati ``adukkhamasukha''nti.
[03] 597^b^.^eb^ ``upekkhāsatipārisuddhi''nti, tattha katamā upekkhā? yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhā''.
[03] tattha katamā sati? yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati ``sati''. ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya vivaṭā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā. tena vuccati ``upekkhāsatipārisuddhi''nti.
[03] 598^b^.^eb^ ``catuttha''nti ^a^T0.0353^ea^ gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṃ, idaṃ catutthaṃ samāpajjatīti catutthaṃ.
[03] 599^b^.^eb^ ``jhāna''nti upekkhā, sati, cittassekaggatā.
[03] 600^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti ^a^M0.0272^ea^ yo catutthassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 601^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.

[03] 602^b^.^eb^ ``sabbaso ^a^V0.0294^ea^ rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā''ti tattha katamā rūpasaññā? rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ -- imā vuccanti ``rūpasaññāyo''. imā rūpasaññāyo atikkanto hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto. tena vuccati ``sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā''ti.

[03] 603^b^.^eb^ ``paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā''ti tattha katamā paṭighasaññā? rūpasaññā saddasaññā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbasaññā -- imā vuccanti paṭighasaññāyo. imā paṭighasaññāyo santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. tena vuccati ``paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā''ti.

[03] 604^b^.^eb^ ``nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā''ti tattha katamā nānattasaññā? asamāpannassa manodhātu samaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātu ^a^T0.0354^ea^ ^a^P0.0262^ea^ samaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ -- imā vuccanti ``nānattasaññāyo''. imā nānattasaññāyo na manasi karoti. tena vuccati ``nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā''ti.

[03] 605^b^.^eb^ ``ananto ākāso''ti, tattha katamo ākāso? yo ākāso ākāsagataṃ aghaṃ aghagataṃ vivaro vivaragataṃ asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehi -- ayaṃ vuccati ``ākāso''. tasmiṃ ākāse cittaṃ ṭhapeti saṇṭhapeti anantaṃ pharati. tena vuccati ``ananto ākāso''ti.
[03] 606^b^.^eb^ ``ākāsānañcāyatana''nti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā.
[03] 607^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti yo ākāsānañcāyatanassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 608^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... ^a^M0.0273^ea^ tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 609^b^.^eb^ ``sabbaso ^a^V0.0295^ea^ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti imaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ atikkanto hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto. tena vuccati ``sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti.
[03] 610^b^.^eb^ ``anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭṭhaṃ manasi karoti anantaṃ pharati. tena vuccati ``anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti.
[03] 611^b^.^eb^ ``viññāṇañcāyatana''nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā.
[03] 612^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti ^a^T0.0355^ea^ yo viññāṇañcāyatanassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 613^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 614^b^.^eb^ ``sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti imaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ atikkanto hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto. tena vuccati ``sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti.
[03] 615^b^.^eb^ ``natthi kiñcī''ti taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ bhāveti vibhāveti antarabhāveti, ``natthi kiñcī''ti passati. tena vuccati ``natthi kiñcī''ti.
[03] 616^b^.^eb^ ``ākiñcaññāyatana''nti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā.
[03] 617^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti ^a^P0.0263^ea^ yo ākiñcaññāyatanassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 618^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti ^a^V0.0296^ea^ ...pe0... tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 619^b^.^eb^ ``sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti imaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ atikkanto hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto. tena vuccati ``sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammā''ti.

[03] ``nevasaññīnāsaññī''ti ^a^M0.0274^ea^ taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāveti. tena vuccati ``nevasaññīnāsaññī''ti {ayaṃ pāṭho mātikāyaṃ natthi, niddese pana sabbapotthakesu dissati}.
[03] 620^b^.^eb^ ``nevasaññānāsaññāyatana''nti ^a^T0.0356^ea^ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā.
[03] 621^b^.^eb^ ``upasampajjā''ti yo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
[03] 622^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[06] suttantabhājanīyaṃ.
[03] 623^b^.^eb^ cattāri ^a^V0.0297^ea^ jhānāni -- paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ.

[03] 624^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ ^a^M0.0275^ea^, tasmiṃ samaye tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0264^ea^ ^a^T0.0357^ea^ katamaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- upekkhā, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``catutthaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.
[06] catukkaṃ.

[03] 625^b^.^eb^ idha ^a^V0.0298^ea^ bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``catutthaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] 628^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0277^ea^ katamaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[01] tattha ^a^T0.0360^ea^ katamaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā sukhassa ca pahānā ^a^V0.0300^ea^ ...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- upekkhā, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``catutthaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] 631^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja ^a^T0.0362^ea^ viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye ^a^P0.0267^ea^ pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] 636^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... pañcamaṃ ^a^T0.0365^ea^ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- upekkhā, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``pañcamaṃ ^a^P0.0269^ea^ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttā.

[03] 637^b^.^eb^ idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye arūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti -- upekkhā, cittassekaggatā. idaṃ vuccati ``catutthaṃ jhānaṃ''. avasesā dhammā jhānasampayuttāti.
[06] abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ.

[03] 638^b^.^eb^ cattāri ^a^M0.0281^ea^ ^a^V0.0304^ea^ jhānāni -- idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0... vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0... pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī''ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0... sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
[03] 639^b^.^eb^ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati ^a^T0.0366^ea^ abyākatā...pe0... kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

[03] 640^b^.^eb^ siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā. tīṇi jhānāni -- etthuppannaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ṭhapetvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ -- etthuppannaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ṭhapetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ. siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnānupādāniyā. siyā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā, siyā asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikā. paṭhamaṃ ^a^P0.0270^ea^ jhānaṃ -- etthuppanne vitakkavicāre ṭhapetvā savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ, tīṇi jhānāni avitakkāvicārā. dve jhānāni -- etthuppannaṃ pītiṃ ṭhapetvā pītisahagatā, tīṇi jhānāni -- etthuppannaṃ sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā sukhasahagatā, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ -- etthuppannaṃ upekkhaṃ ṭhapetvā upekkhāsahagataṃ. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā. neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā. siyā ācayagāmino, siyā apacayagāmino, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino. siyā sekkhā, siyā asekkhā, siyā nevasekkhanāsekkhā. siyā mahaggatā, siyā appamāṇā. tīṇi jhānāni na vattabbā parittārammaṇātipi, mahaggatārammaṇātipi, siyā appamāṇārammaṇā ^a^M0.0282^ea^, siyā na vattabbā appamāṇārammaṇāti; catutthaṃ ^a^V0.0305^ea^ jhānaṃ siyā parittārammaṇaṃ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, siyā appamāṇārammaṇaṃ; siyā na vattabbaṃ parittārammaṇantipi, mahaggatārammaṇantipi, appamāṇārammaṇantipi ^a^T0.0367^ea^. siyā majjhimā, siyā paṇītā. siyā sammattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā. tīṇi jhānāni na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā maggahetukātipi, maggādhipatinotipi; catutthaṃ jhānaṃ siyā maggārammaṇaṃ, siyā maggahetukaṃ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṃ maggārammaṇantipi, maggahetukantipi maggādhipatītipi. siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino. siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. tīṇi jhānāni na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi, anāgatārammaṇātipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi; catutthaṃ jhānaṃ siyā atītārammaṇaṃ, siyā anāgatārammaṇaṃ, siyā paccuppannārammaṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ atītārammaṇantipi, anāgatārammaṇantipi, paccuppannāramaṇantipi. siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. tīṇi jhānāni bahiddhārammaṇā, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ siyā ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, siyā bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ ajjhattārammaṇantipi, bahiddhārammaṇantipi, ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇantipi. anidassanāppaṭighā.

[03] 641^b^.^eb^ na hetū, sahetukā, hetusampayuttā, na vattabbā ``hetū ceva sahetukā cā''ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū, na vattabbā ``hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā''ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū, na hetū sahetukā.

[03] 642^b^.^eb^ catasso ^a^M0.0284^ea^ ^a^P0.0272^ea^ ^a^V0.0307^ea^ appamaññāyo -- idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ {catutthiṃ (sī0)}. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena {abyāpajjhena (sī0 syā0)} pharitvā viharati. karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karuṇāsahagatena cetasā vipulena ^a^T0.0370^ea^ mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati. muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ muditāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati. upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
[03] 643^b^.^eb^ kathañca bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati? seyyathāpi nāma ekaṃ puggalaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ disvā mettāyeyya, evameva sabbe satte mettāya pharati.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0308^ea^ katamā mettā? yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''.

[03] tattha katamaṃ cittaṃ? yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu ^a^P0.0273^ea^ -- idaṃ ^a^M0.0285^ea^ vuccati ``cittaṃ''. idaṃ cittaṃ imāya mettāya sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ. tena vuccati ``mettāsahagatena cetasā''ti.
[03] 644^b^.^eb^ ``ekaṃ disa''nti puratthimaṃ vā disaṃ pacchimaṃ vā disaṃ uttaraṃ vā disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ vā disaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā tiriyaṃ vā vidisaṃ vā.
[03] 645^b^.^eb^ ``pharitvā''ti ^a^T0.0371^ea^ pharitvā adhimuccitvā.
[03] 646^b^.^eb^ ``viharatī''ti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. tena vuccati ``viharatī''ti.
[03] 647^b^.^eb^ ``tathā dutiya''nti yatheva ekaṃ disaṃ tathā dutiyaṃ disaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ disaṃ tathā catutthaṃ disaṃ tathā uddhaṃ tathā adho tathā tiriyaṃ tathā vidisaṃ.
[03] 648^b^.^eb^ ``sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ loka''nti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ. pariyādāyavacanametaṃ -- ``sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ loka''nti.

[03] 684^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā mettā? idha ^a^P0.0277^ea^ bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ ^a^M0.0290^ea^, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''. avasesā dhammā mettāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā mettā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ ^a^V0.0314^ea^ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ ^a^T0.0376^ea^ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''. avasesā dhammā mettāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā mettā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''. avasesā dhammā mettāya sampayuttā.

[03] 686^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0278^ea^ ^a^V0.0315^ea^ katamā karuṇā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā karuṇā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā karuṇā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] 687^b^.^eb^ idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti ^a^T0.0378^ea^ -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ ^a^M0.0292^ea^ samaye karuṇā ^a^V0.0316^ea^ karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā ^a^P0.0279^ea^ karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.

[03] 688^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā muditā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye muditā muditāyanā muditāyitattaṃ muditācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``muditā''. avasesā dhammā muditāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā muditā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ ^a^T0.0379^ea^ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye muditā muditāyatanā muditāyitattaṃ muditācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``muditā''. avasesā dhammā muditāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā muditā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye muditā muditāyanā muditāyitattaṃ muditācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``muditā''. avasesā dhammā muditāya sampayuttā.

[03] 689^b^.^eb^ idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye muditā muditāyanā muditāyitattaṃ muditācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``muditā''. avasesā dhammā muditāya sampayuttā.

[03] idha ^a^V0.0317^ea^ bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ ^a^M0.0293^ea^ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye muditā muditāyanā muditāyitattaṃ muditācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``muditā''. avasesā dhammā muditāya sampayuttā.

[03] 690^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā upekkhā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhāyanā upekkhāyitattaṃ upekkhācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``upekkhā''. avasesā dhammā upekkhāya sampayuttā.
[03] 691^b^.^eb^ catasso appamaññāyo -- mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhā.

[03] 692^b^.^eb^ tattha katamā mettā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''. avasesā dhammā mettāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0318^ea^ katamā mettā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ ^a^P0.0280^ea^ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ ^a^T0.0381^ea^, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā ^a^M0.0294^ea^ upacitattā vipākaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``mettā''. avasesā dhammā mettāya sampayuttā.

[03] tattha katamā karuṇā? idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammā kusalā. tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā...pe0... dutiyaṃ ^a^T0.0382^ea^ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati ``karuṇā''. avasesā dhammā karuṇāya sampayuttā.
